title: Sopromar logo fonts
content:
Hello all!

Can someone identify the fonts on this logo? Thanks in advanced!!!

Font: 

 Typewritter 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155635/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Sopromar logo typefaces.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155635/http:/typophile.com/files/Sopromar%20logo%20typefaces.jpg) | 321.32 KB |
author: Calabaça

comments.content:
|ESTALEIRO| and |NAVAL LAGOS| appear to be Helvetica Bold or Helvetica Bold Condensed:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/helvetica/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155635/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/helvetica/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/helvetica/")

|SOPROMAR| looks to be Typewriter Bold or Typewriter Narrow Bold:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/typewriter/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155635/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/typewriter/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/typewriter/")
